content: Andy uses the Recruitment App which includes several custom objects including jobs, applications, and candidates. However, he also frequently uses the reports tab. The reports tab is not included in the Recruitment App. What could Andy do to improve navigation?
options: A. Add the Reports tab to Favorites.
B. Add the Reports tab to the navigation bar by clicking the pencil icon.
C. Add the Reports tab to the App via Setup.

content: What is TRUE about Salesforce usernames on the user record?
options: A. Usernames must be in email format.

content: What dashboard property can be configured to ensure a user will only see data they have access to based on their security and sharing settings?
options: A. View Dashboard as "The dashboard viewer"

content: You would like to see a report of opportunities with or without products. How can this be achieved?
options: B. Use standard report "Opportunities with Products"
title: Question 23

content: The VP of Sales would like to receive a dashboard daily. Her team should also receive the dashboard. A role hierarchy has been created so that the role of the VP of Sales is above her subordinate’s role. How can this be achieved?
options: A. Create a dashboard subscription and share with the VP of Sales role and subordinates.
B. Create a dashboard subscription and share with a public group.
C. Create a dashboard subscription and share with individual users.

content: The telemarketing team needs to generate reports on telemarketing leads. Only certain fields should be available on the report. The Telemarketing Manager would also like several default columns to be included every time a report is created. What is needed to fulfill this requirement? (Select 2)
options: B. Select which fields are available and set as default
